# Pull Request Template

Please use this template for user-facing or structural changes.

- **What I changed**: (one-line summary)
- **Files touched**: (list)
- **Why**: (short reason)
- **How tested / validated**: (local preview steps; screenshots if UI changes)

Checklist
- [ ] I opened and previewed `index.html` locally (or used Live Server) for UI changes.
- [ ] I updated any duplicate values (contact email/phone) across files if changed.
- [ ] No server-side code or build tooling added.

Notes for reviewers: include screenshots and device widths tested (mobile/desktop) when relevant.
